plot: Haunted by his tragic past, 20-year-old David arrives in a French village to study art and falls in love with a mysterious woman. Although revelling in their affair and his success in repressing these painful memories, David is constantly reminded that he can't escape the truth.
title: They Dream
plot_es: Haunted by his tragic past, 20-year-old David arrives in a French village to study art and falls in love with a mysterious woman. Although revelling in their affair and his success in repressing these painful memories, David is constantly reminded that he can't escape the truth.
plot_en: Haunted by his tragic past, 20-year-old David arrives in a French village to study art and falls in love with a mysterious woman. Although revelling in their affair and his success in repressing these painful memories, David is constantly reminded that he can't escape the truth.
